product.subheadline: Boldy state your unique selling point. Included your target audience in the the header or sub-header.

hero.startHint: Start your free trial, no credit card necessary.

featuresNetcoreSaasv2.headline: What's new in v2.0.0?
featuresNetcoreSaasv2.subheadline: I've added a bunch of new features for the last 2 months.
featuresNetcoreSaasv2.feature1Description: This demo treats them as companies. Start with the default workspace, and all your IAppWorkspaceEntity entities will be filtered based on the selected workspace.
featuresNetcoreSaasv2.feature2Description: Optical character recognition with Azure. If you upload a receipt, it will scan the possible total, date, website, email... customize it.
featuresNetcoreSaasv2.feature3Description: Add a project, set a color and add receipts to it (to track your expenses) and update the status to Active, Pending or Archived.
featuresNetcoreSaasv2.feature4Description: A better dashboard using real application data, like Workspaces, Users, Projects, Suppliers and Customers... (if any on selected period).
featuresNetcoreSaasv2.feature5Description: Almost every component is strong-typed using $refs, instead of // @ts-ignore this.$refs['errorModal'].show('') -> this.$refs.errorModal.show('')
featuresNetcoreSaasv2.feature6Description: I have decided not to learn React until I am satisfied with a truly customizable codebase for any .NET and Vue developer.

feature1.headline: Upload receipts to bill
feature1.subheadline: Manage all your transactions, expense and income
feature1.feature1Description: Add one or more workspace for better data management
feature1.feature3Description: If your subscription is elegible, we generate the invoices

feature2.headline: Send with WhatsApp
feature2.subheadline: If you use your cell phone to work, it will surely be more convenient for you to send and check receipts and invoices from your WhatsApp.
feature2.feature2Description: How much you have spent per company/project/user...?
feature2.feature3Description: Do you need help? Send us a message

feature3.headline: What, when and how much does your company spend?
feature3.subheadline: From the moment you enter the portal, you can see how much remains to be billed or how much has been billed in a certain period.
feature3.feature1Description: How your expenses and income have been distributed per project
feature3.feature2Description: Of the members of your team, who is the one that consumes more or less
feature3.feature3Description: In which establishment do you usually spend more

feature4.headline: Instant receipt scanning
feature4.subheadline: From the moment you upload the receipt, the important information to invoice is detected (Total, Date, Issuer Tax ID...).
feature4.feature3Description: We detect the establishment website and/or Tax ID

feature5.headline: Project management
feature5.subheadline: Manage the profitability of a project or assign a budget for better control.
feature5.feature1Description: Define the current project of your company
feature5.feature2Description: Control what is the estimated cost of the project
feature5.feature3Description: Change to the corresponding project status

feature1.headline: Clean Architecture
feature1.subheadline: We've split the project into multiple 'layers'
feature1.feature1Description: Domain, Application, Infrastructure, WebApi, IntegrationTests, UnitTests
feature1.feature2Description: Every entity has its own repository interface and implementation
feature1.feature3Description: You can control if an entity belongs to a tenant or in the master database

feature2.headline: Unit and Integration Tests
feature2.subheadline: Almost every controller method has its own integration test
feature2.feature1Description: Tests for Authentication, Users, Tenants, Subscriptions, Transactions...
feature2.feature2Description: Include your 'testing' keys, and each test will create new stripe customers
feature2.feature3Description: Test how your subscription mechanism will work against a real world API

feature3.headline: Multi-organization & multi-workspace
feature3.subheadline: Each user can create its own organizations (tenants) and each organization has its own workspaces
feature3.feature1Description: The owner of the organization can update general settings
feature3.feature2Description: Can manage members and update subscription

feature4.headline: Multi-tenancy
feature4.subheadline: Decide if you want only one database or one database per tenant
feature4.feature1Description: You only have one database, and a tenant column of your core models
feature4.feature2Description: Each tenant will have its own database for data isolation

feature5.headline: Multi-theme
feature5.subheadline: Using the power of TailwindCSS you can customize your own themes or use a default
feature5.feature1Description: Tailwind based themes so you can focus on design right away
feature5.feature2Description: Files easy to configure to customize your own themes

feature6.headline: Multi-language
feature6.subheadline: You can launch internationally by adding your language
feature6.feature2Description: Files easy to configure to customize your own languages

feature8.headline: Dashboard
feature8.subheadline: A better, data-driven dashboard to enlighten your customers
feature8.feature1Description: Count, sum or Average your most important entities (transactions, users, storage usage...)
feature8.feature2Description: Give your customers a faster way to do things
feature8.feature3Description: Change the current workspace to load data related to it

feature9.headline: Dynamic pricing
feature9.subheadline: 3 simple steps to generate your Stripe subscriptions/products:
feature9.feature1Description: Modify your plans, currencies, billing periods, titles and more
feature9.feature2: 2. Generate them on DB and Stripe
feature9.feature2Description: Go to /admin/products and click on 'Generate prices on database and stripe'
feature9.feature3Description: Depending on your Database and Stripe environment variables, test however your app should work

feature10.headline: And more!
feature10.subheadline: Features based on real world SaaS applications
feature10.feature2Description: Invite users by email or send them an invitation link
feature10.feature3Description: Add resources and assign them to certain subscriptions and roles
